details.purpose: To record details pertaining to open or keyhole operation performed

items.items: Record of details pertaining to open or keyhole operation performed
Identify any complications incurred in performing the surgery
Identify any issue or difficulty faced during surgery
Overall comment about the operation performed
Further details about operation that are very specific to purpose
Comment about the incision and opening phase of surgical operation
Cluster for further details about operation that are very specific to purpose
